Bike Sharing Analysis

통계분석기법 :일원 분산분석과 다중 회귀분석을 통한 유의변수 확인

1. 데이터 불러오기

df<- read.csv('./train.csv', header = T)

library(gplots)

Attaching package: 'gplots'
The following object is masked from 'package:stats':

    lowess
plotmeans(count~season, data=df)
Warning in arrows(x, li, x, pmax(y - gap, li), col = barcol, lwd = lwd, : zero-
length arrow is of indeterminate angle and so skipped
Warning in arrows(x, ui, x, pmin(y + gap, ui), col = barcol, lwd = lwd, : zero-
length arrow is of indeterminate angle and so skipped

boxplot(count~season, data=df)

2. 데이터 구조 확인

정규성 검정

#qqnorm을 통한 정규성 검정( qqnorm은 정규분포와 비교)
library(car)
Loading required package: carData

Attaching package: 'car'
The following object is masked from 'package:psych':

    logit
The following object is masked from 'package:dplyr':

    recode
The following object is masked from 'package:purrr':

    some
#qqplot(df$count,df$season)  (qqplot은 변수간 비교)
qqnorm(df$count)

정규성 확인 (엔더슨달링 테스트)

# 데이터 5000개 초과로 앤더슨달링 테스트 사용(샤피로 5000개)
# 분산분석은 정규성 가정에 크게 제한 받지 않음
library(nortest)
ad.test(df$count)

    Anderson-Darling normality test

data:  df$count
A = 358.33, p-value < 2.2e-16
#이상치 확인 (bonferroniP 0.05보다 작으면 이상치)
car::outlierTest(season.aov)
No Studentized residuals with Bonferroni p < 0.05
Largest |rstudent|:
     rstudent unadjusted p-value Bonferroni p
9346  4.32533         1.5366e-05      0.16728

등분산성 검정

#등분산성 검정
library(stats)
bartlett.test(count~season, data=df)

    Bartlett test of homogeneity of variances

data:  count by season
Bartlett's K-squared = 621.16, df = 3, p-value < 2.2e-16
#oneway.test는 등분산을 충족하지 않을때
oneway.test(count~season, data=df)

    One-way analysis of means (not assuming equal variances)

data:  count and season
F = 335.09, num df = 3.0, denom df = 5945.6, p-value < 2.2e-16

검정결과 season, weather 독립변수가 유의함

-1. holiday독립변수들 등분산성 검정

bartlett.test(count~holiday, data=df)

    Bartlett test of homogeneity of variances

data:  count by holiday
Bartlett's K-squared = 3.2788, df = 1, p-value = 0.07018
summary(aov(count~holiday, data=df))
               Df    Sum Sq Mean Sq F value Pr(>F)
holiday         1     10388   10388   0.317  0.574
Residuals   10884 357162526   32815

-2. workingday 독립변수 등분산성 검정

bartlett.test(count~workingday, data=df)

    Bartlett test of homogeneity of variances

data:  count by workingday
Bartlett's K-squared = 16.914, df = 1, p-value = 3.91e-05
oneway.test(count~workingday, data=df)

    One-way analysis of means (not assuming equal variances)

data:  count and workingday
F = 1.5283, num df = 1.0, denom df = 7176.3, p-value = 0.2164

-3. weather 독립변수 등분산성 검정

df[df$weather==4,]
                datetime season holiday workingday weather temp  atemp humidity
5632 2012-01-09 18:00:00      1       0          1       4  8.2 11.365       86
     windspeed casual registered count
5632    6.0032      6        158   164
except4<- df[-5632, ]
bartlett.test(count~weather, data=except4)

    Bartlett test of homogeneity of variances

data:  count by weather
Bartlett's K-squared = 151.06, df = 2, p-value < 2.2e-16
oneway.test(count~weather, data=except4)

    One-way analysis of means (not assuming equal variances)

data:  count and weather
F = 140.9, num df = 2.0, denom df = 2449.2, p-value < 2.2e-16

회귀분석

plot(df$count, df$temp)

cor(df$count, df$temp)
[1] 0.3944536
min(df$temp)
[1] 0.82
plot(df$count, df$humidity)

plot(df$count, df$registered)

시간데이터

df$month.df<- month(df$datetime)
df$hour.df<- hour(df$datetime)

회귀분석 검정

df.lm <- lm(count~temp+ humidity+ windspeed+ month.df+hour.df, data=df)
plot(df.lm)

후진제거법

#df.lm <- lm(count~, data=df)
df.lm <- lm(count~temp+ humidity+ windspeed+ month.df+hour.df, data=df)
select.var<- step(df.lm, direction = 'backward')
Start:  AIC=108749.6
count ~ temp + humidity + windspeed + month.df + hour.df
